article:

The main   _   of online education is that it allows you to   _   at your own pace and on your own time. Depending on the nature of the courses, online education will provide you with a certain time   _   for you to compete it .
    One of the biggest  _   of online education is that it does not provide you with the face-to-face interaction with a teacher. But you can   _   with other students through the use of discussion boards, messaging programs,   _  and web-conferencing programs.
